title: Jax Taylor and Brittany Cartwright enjoy a stroll with their dogs while on holiday in Palm Springs
text:
They catapulted to fame as stars of the popular Bravo show Vanderpump Rules.

But Jax Taylor and Brittany Cartwright looked worlds away from their television personas as they enjoyed a romantic holiday in Palm Springs, California.

The reality stars took a break from their bustling careers for a romantic walk in the desert with their two pet pooches in tow.

Out and about: Jax Taylor and Brittany Cartwright looked worlds away from their television personas as they enjoyed a romantic holiday in Palm Springs, California

Brittany kept things casual wearing a dusty rose colored top which was cinched at the waist to highlight her frame.

She sported a pair of light blue denim slacks with a navy stripe running vertically down her thigh and distressed elements along her knees.

Her afternoon ensemble was complete with a pair of leopard print trainers and solitary diamond stud earrings.

Vacation mode: The reality stars took a break from their bustling careers for a romantic walk in the desert with their two pet pooches in tow

The Kentucky-born beauty slicked her dark brown hair back into a top bun and kept a pair of aviator sunglasses over her eyes.

Jax looked extremely comfortable wearing black sweatpants with a matching hooded sweatshirt.

He covered up his shaggy brown hair with a black-and-white trucker hat and wore a pair of Nike sneakers.

Casual crew: Jax looked extremely comfortable wearing black sweatpants with a matching hooded sweatshirt

The newlyweds recently celebrated their love with a star-studded summer wedding in her home state, which was well-attended by their Vanderpump Rules co-stars.

Brittany and Jax's relationship has been well-documented on the fan-favorite reality show, which seems to have recently wrapped filming its eighth season.

The show focuses on the lives of a rowdy group of servers and bartenders at just one of Lisa Vanderpump's many bars and restaurants in West Hollywood.
description: The reality stars took a break from their bustling careers for a romantic walk in the desert with their two pet pooches in tow.
